name: The 4th International Conference on Mechatronics Systems and Control Engineering
content: Paper Publicationï¼š All submissions will be peer reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. Accepted and registered papers will be published into ICMSCE 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be published into Journal of Physics: Conference Series (JPCS), and submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec.
